content: पाटकः [पट्-ण्वुल्] {@--1@} A splitter, divider. {@--2@} Part of a village. {@--3@} The half of a village. {@--4@} A kind of musical instrument. {@--5@} A bank, shore. {@--6@} A flight of steps leading to the water. {@--7@} Loss of capital or stock. {@--8@} A long span. {@--9@} Throwing dice.
